title: Is Raymundo Mad At Bobby? + Lunchbox Has Been Threatened + Mat Kearny On Playing At Bobby’s Proposal
itunes:title: Is Raymundo Mad At Bobby? + Lunchbox Has Been Threatened + Mat Kearny On Playing At Bobby’s Proposal
description:
After Raymundo got upset at Mike D last week for stealing his wedding thunder, Bobby has now also gotten engaged. Bobby talks with Raymundo to find out if he’s upset at him too for getting engaged so close to his wedding. Lunchbox gets creeped out after someone left a note on his car. Plus, Bobby talks with artist Mat Kearny who performed for his and Caitlin’s engagement on Sunday!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
